frontmatter.title: Konfigurasjonskontroll for økt sikkerhet i skyløsninger
frontmatter.description: Vi lever i en usikker tid. Det er krig i Europa. Nasjonal Sikkerhetsmyndighet (NSM) ber norske virksomheter være ekstra årvåkne. Og Uber ble utsatt for datainnbrudd.

frontmatter.title: The everyday juggling act
frontmatter.description: One thing we all have in common is a shortage of time. This is a realization many of us have come to after having leveled up for a while. Time spent at work is considerable. If working eight hours a day, one third of the day is spent working.

frontmatter.title: Don’t call security – install them!
frontmatter.description: If your business does not have a serious security system that constantly monitors the whole system, you are really only waiting for uninvited guests. This is not scaremongering but a statistical observation.
